channel.title: [Z508, 508 loading 525 cache]right click problem[Z508, 508 loading 525 Cache]
channel.description:
[Z508, 508 loading 525 cache]right click problem[Z508, 508 loading 525 Cache]
Hello,
I dunno of this is server sided or client sided problem, but right click is really buggy, you know if you right click a for example: Banker
You have the option's: Talk Bank Cancel
Well if I right click on the banker the Option's popup for like 0.5 seconds, and than they flash away, so its hard to bank, bank ''ALL' cuz you have to do it really quik, this server isnt public yet, but I can know for sure this cost's players, since its anoying as hell, Help me please.
Note: I dunno of this is server/client sided so im posting in both section's.
Thanks for reading, hope to get GOOD help from YOU!

item.description:
@Ragean wrote:

[Z508, 508 loading 525 cache]right click problem[Z508, 508 loading 525 Cache]

Hello,

I dunno of this is server sided or client sided problem, but right click is really buggy, you know if you right click a for example: Banker

You have the option’s:
Talk
Bank
Cancel

Well if I right click on the banker the Option’s popup for like 0.5 seconds, and than they flash away, so its hard to bank, bank '‘ALL’ cuz you have to do it really quik, this server isnt public yet, but I can know for sure this cost’s players, since its anoying as hell, Help me please.

Note: I dunno of this is server/client sided so im posting in both section’s.

Thanks for reading, hope to get GOOD help from YOU!
